title: Episode 308: Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat
description: This week on ﻿Eat Your Words﻿, host Cathy Erway is joined by chef and writer Samin Nosrat, a Chez Panisse alum and author of the New York Times bestselling book Salt Fat Acid Heat. Featuring a foreword by Michael Pollan, the book espouses a revolutionary, yet simple, philosophy: master the use of just four elements, and anything you cook will be delicious.
